page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT 2
page.content: {VIDEOS}More children watch videos than read books or visit cinemas. Half our sample have a V.C.R. at home and half of them list one or more "video nasty" as favourite viewing- usually films depicting excessive violence or super- natural horrors. {TELEVISION:}The most popular leisure activity. All the sample have a T.V. at home and half have a video and/or computer. Many children watch T.V. in moderation but some watch for several hours daily, including late evening programmes. Soap operas are most widely watched (Grange Hill, Eastenders,Crossroads, Emmerdale Farm) then comedies both children's and adult (Adrian Mole, Cartoons, Open All Hours, Crry On films, Sorry). Next in popularity are American action/adventure/ police series eg. A Team,Street Hawk, Dempsey & Makepeace.
